title: Active Learning-Based Online Education Course for Engineering Design Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering design processes and project management experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment design considering workplace integration for working adult learners.

learning_goals: Learners can establish project plans to solve real-world workplace problems by applying systemic design methodologies
Learners experience iterative improvement of design solutions through peer feedback and collaboration at least twice
Learners engage in expert mentoring and peer evaluations at least once weekly in LMS-based discussion forums
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
